com.rrbrussell.enigma_demonstration

Class Rotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rrbrussell.enigma_demonstration.Rotor

  • public class Rotor
extends java.lang.Object
    The Wermacht and Kriegsmarine default rotors.
    Author:
    Robert R. Russell, robert@rrbrussell.com

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Rotor.Rotors
      Static data for the default Wermacht and Kriegsmarine rotors.

    • Field Detail

      • Ringstellung

        private int Ringstellung
        Which position in the Wiring maps to 0 on the Indicator.

      • Indicator

        private int Indicator
        Which position on the Indicator ring is visible.

      • RightToLeftWiring

        private char[] RightToLeftWiring

      • LeftToRightWiring

        private char[] LeftToRightWiring

      • IndicatorTransferPosition

        private int IndicatorTransferPosition
        The position on the indicator ring when the rotor steps the next rotor in sequence and itself.

      • RingSize

        public static final int RingSize
        Value for the Rotor.RingSize constraint.

        The constraint is all values mapping into or out of a rotor must be between 0 and Rotor.RingSize - 1.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rotor

        public Rotor(Rotor.Rotors Chosen,
     int Ringstellung)
        Create a new Rotor. Use Rotor.getValidRotors to get a list of available rotors in this implementation and their identifiers. Pick one of those Rotors and a Ringstellung to create this Rotor.

    • Method Detail

      • getValidRotors

        public static Rotor.Rotors[] getValidRotors()

      • Step

        public boolean Step()
        Moves the Rotor on the spindle.
        Returns:
        True if the Rotor instance has stepped past its turnover point.

      • SetGrundstellung

        public void SetGrundstellung(int Grundstellung)
        The Grundstellung is the Indicator position for starting encipherment. Calling this after encipherment has begun is undefined behavior.
        Parameters:
        Grundstellung - The new Indicator position.

      • SatisfiesRingConstraint

        public static boolean SatisfiesRingConstraint(int Number)
        Parameters:
        Number - The number to test.
        Returns:
        True if Number is between 0 and Rotor.RingSize - 1 inclusive.

        Just used a a testing tool.
